src:
Odprli prenovljeno cesto
07 Nov 2019, 14:00 by M. Ž.
Nestoplja vas - V Nestoplji vasi je bilo včeraj še zadnje odprtje v sklopu praznovanja semiškega občinskega praznika Občine Semič, tokrat so namenu predali prenovljeno cesto v Nestoplji vasi in Brezjah pri Vinjem Vrhu.
Županja Polona Kambič je v nagovoru izpostavila, da je bil že pred leti izdelan prioritetni vrstni red obnov občinskih cest in ravno odsek ceste proti Brezju je, kot so na občini zapisali v sporočilu za javnost, »izkazoval visoko potrebo po sanaciji, sledila pa mu je še prenova ceste proti Nestoplji vasi«.
V sprejetem proračunu sprva ni bila predvidena ureditev v tem delu občine, saj je bil denar namenjen za obnovo kuhinje v vrtcu. Ker pa izvajalca zaradi visokih ponudb niso izbrali, so bila prosta povratna sredstva po 23. členu ZFO preusmerjena v prenovo ceste v omenjenih vaseh. Z javnim razpisom so delo oddali podjetju CGP iz Novega mesta.
Skupaj so preplastili 1.350 metrov poti od Brezja pri Vinjem Vrhu do Nestoplje vasi ter po samih naseljih v povprečni širini 3 metre, na novo pa asfaltirano še 290 metrov makedamskih odsekov. Celotna vrednost naložbe skupaj z gradbenim nadzorom je znašala 143.920 evrov.
Novo pridobitev je blagoslovil župnik Luka Zidanšek, kulturni program ob tej priložnosti pa so pripravili vaščani.

text:
Open the renovated road
07 Nov 2019, 14:00 by M. Ž.
Nestoplja vas - The Nestoplja vas was the last opening yesterday as part of the celebration of the Semic municipal holiday of the Municipality of Semič, this time they handed over a renovated road to Nestoplja vas and Brezje near Vinji Vrh.
In her address, Mayor Polona Kambic emphasized that a priority order of reconstruction of municipal roads was drawn up years ago and that the section of road to Brezje, as stated in the press release, "showed a high need for rehabilitation, followed by further renovation of the road to Nestoplja vas.
Initially, the adopted budget did not envisage arrangements in this part of the municipality, as the money was used to renovate the kitchen in the kindergarten. However, because they did not select the contractor due to the high bids, the free refunds under Article 23 of the ZFO were diverted to the reconstruction of the road in the mentioned villages. The contract was awarded to CGP from Novo mesto.
A total of 1,350 meters of the road from Brezje pri Vinji Vrh to Nestoplje vas and through settlements averaged 3 meters in width, and another 290 meters of Macedonian sections were paved. The total value of the investment, including construction supervision, amounted to EUR 143,920.
The new acquisition was blessed by the parish priest, Luka Zidanšek, and the cultural program was prepared by the villagers on this occasion.
